title: Avant-Garde’s Chairman has fled the country, use INTERPOL to arrest him – JVP MP
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); JVP MP Vijith Herath on Tuesday (5) filed a petition in Parliament.
The petition notes that Avant-Garde Chairman Nissanka Senadhipathi, who looted public funds, had fled the country at 3:30 AM on Tuesday (5).
Vijitha Herath called on the Parliament to take the necessary measures to seek INTERPOL assistance to arrest Senadhipathi.
He further called on Parliament to even shut down the airport in order to prevent people who looted public funds from fleeing the country and thereafter produce them in court for legal action.
